o = ffi()
-----
*parameter `single` is not occupied
=====
o = ffi(4)
-----
4
=====
o = ffi(4, 8)
-----
12
=====
o = ffi(single=4)
-----
4
=====
o = ffi(oneof=8)
-----
*parameter `single` is not occupied
=====
o = ffi(single=4,oneof=8)
-----
12
=====
o = ffi(oneof=8,single=4)
-----
12
=====
o = ffi(4,oneof=8)
-----
12
